bill.summary:
Expresses serious concern about the public health threat posed by polio.
Implores various entities to act with haste and dedication to eradicate polio by 2018.
Calls upon the executive branch to provide the necessary resources to end the scourge of polio, including closely monitoring laboratory stocks of the polio virus.
